summary: Set in Ireland during the War of Independence, two sisters lives are changed forever as they care for a wounded soldier. What transpires is a tragic love story of a household and its inhabitants, caught in the crucible of dark deep secrets.
cast: Tara Breathnach|Muireann Bird|Gerard McCarthy|Brian Fortune|Elliot Moriarty|Andy Kellegher|Rosemary Henderson|Michael James Ford|Mark Tankersley|Blathnaid Ryan|Maura Clancy|Derek O'Sullivan|Michael Hough|Patrick Kelly
title: A Nightingale Falling
